column2: Truly is legendary crown, which created by Nagash long ago to improve his arts in necromancy.
This blade was given to Alcadizar for kill Nagash by Skaven council. Most powerfull weapon, but user paying a price to wear it.
This ancinet blade... gived me power!!!
Crown of Hagash? Impossible!But such power... i must wear it immediately!!!
Hmm, whole lore of necromancy, very nice!... But what is it? Nagash...
